attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are many more serious anti social behaviour problems in this country than smoking normal cigarettes.
E.G. Excessive drinking,drug abuse,theft of vehicles by underage drivers,uninsured drivers, illegal immigration.
Let all the advertising money against smoking be used against those that break the law instead of against those who are NOT breaking the law.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/AddressASBO/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
